name: The Bul
description: This crisp, refreshing beer and ginger beer cocktail is super-simple to make.
recipeIngredient: 4 ounces fresh lime juice from about 8 limes

recipeInstructions.text: Pour ginger beer and beer carefully into a pitcher. Add lime juice and stir gently to mix. Pour into ice-filled glasses, and garnish each glass with a lime wedge if desired.
